Name: Essentials
Description:
• Plugin & theme updates 
• Proactive security monitoring
• Firewall 
• Hosting support (no surprise bills for discussing & fixing issues related to hosting)
• 9-5 Proactive Uptime Monitoring (if the site goes down we are notified and jump on it)
• SMTP (better email delivery from site)
• SSL Certificate (encryption)
• Daily backups
• Enhanced caching for speed
• Monthly Reporting 
    ◦ Analytics
    ◦ Security
    ◦ Software updates (plugins & themes)
    ◦ Backup history
    ◦ Broken link audits
    ◦ Broken backlink audits
Notes:
Proactive services require no input from client. The Indelible team will monitor and take action on issues as they arise.

Unless otherwise stated, proactive services are in effect from 9-5 Eastern Time

Name: Essentials +
Description:
* Essentials PLUS
* 24/7 Proactive Uptime Monitoring
* Monthly core site audit
* Includes DNS management
* Hourly backups (16GB & higher)
Notes:
Site audit includes:
* Form submission test
* Plugin notice check
* 5 page spot check
* Broken Link Audit
* Broken Backlink Audit

Name: Care Plan
Description:
* Everything Above PLUS
* Up to 2 hours content updates

Name: DNS Management
Description:
* Manages DNS in Indelible account
* Grants access to client support as needed
* Includes domain registration
